title: Axel's Promise
description: AxelPromises are meant to be broken, all except one. The one that binds two people as one. Too bad that’s the one I broke when I screwed up.I lost her because of what I did. She left and in so doing she took something she shouldn’t have. Not without telling me.Now she’s back with fear in her eyes and not alone.Shocked, I have the choice to make more promises or mend the one I broke and take back what was mine.
author: E.C. Land
